title: Want a Free Ticket 4 Our Warm Gun Design Conference?
content:
We have a couple of open spots on our Volunteer Ninja Team for our popular Warm Gun Design Conference on Fri, Dec 2nd  at Hotel Kabuki in SF.

The Qualifications: You must be responsible, friendly and willing to roll up your sleeves to get the job done. The Pay-Off: A free ticket to Warm Gun in exchange for half day of volunteering. Plus an opportunity to meet some really amazing designers and developers. Interested? Email sheila at 500startups dot com and include your mobile number
